testcase.classname: Verify Discover Top Categories and Brochure Download Functionality on Edureka website
testcase.name: Navigate to selected categories from homepage
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on sourceUrl..............................................passed When the user scrolls to the sectionName section............................passed And clicks on category1.....................................................passed And navigates back to homepage..............................................passed And clicks on category2.....................................................passed And navigates back to homepage..............................................passed And clicks on category3.....................................................passed Then each respective category page should load successfully.................passed

testcase.classname: Verify Discover Top Categories and Brochure Download Functionality on Edureka website
testcase.name: Download brochure for PGP in Generative AI and ML and fill details from Excel - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on Edureka homepage......................................passed When user scrolls to the sectionName........................................passed And clicks on category7.....................................................passed And clicks on category8.....................................................passed And clicks on buttonName2...................................................passed And the user reads data from Excel at 0 and 1...............................passed And enters name, email, and phone number from Excel.........................passed Then the brochure request form should be submitted successfully.............passed
